title: Liberal Fascism – Introduction
author: VD
content_html:
I suggest entering into the discussion of the various issues raised in the Introduction after taking the quiz. If you have any questions about Liberal Fascism, this would be the place to raise them. However, please note that because of the controversial nature of the subject, I will be moderating with a heavier hand than usual. The discussion should be focused on the range of issues covered in the Introduction; this is not intended as a forum for anyone to exhibit their own pet theories and/or psychological issues.

The reading for next week will be Chapter 1 – Mussolini: The Father of Fascism and the chapter quiz will be posted on Saturday.
